author: sunsportonline
title: Fabinho to Manchester United, David de Gea to Real Madrid and Zaha to Tottenham: Ten transfers that could go through this summer
text:
EFL Rumour mill Fabinho to Manchester United, David de Gea to Real Madrid and Zaha to Tottenham: Ten transfers that could go through this summer 
Other rumours that are in the pipeline are Arturo Vidal to Chelsea, Antoine Griezmann to Manchester United and Dominic Solanke to Liverpool Video by chris bailey, football whispers 17th February 2017, 12:56 pm
